reviewText: Let me start off by stating that the description is incorrect. The number of discs listed is 4(as of this review). This DVD set actually contains 3 DVD's with Rocky 1 and 2 each being on its own discs. Rocky 3 and 4 are on 1 disc, a double-sided DVD.Each Rocky movie is bare-bones with no special features other than the movie trailer and a few MGM ads. Also included are subtitles in English, French, and Spanish. The movies themselves are standard DVD quality.The price fluctates a bit but I got my set when it was just under 10 bucks, quite a steal for 4 classic Rocky movies. This is an unusual set with just the first 4 movies and no specials. Good budget choice though for those who have not upgraded to Blu-ray yet and want to own the Rocky movies that matter.We all know and love the Rocky saga. Opponents such as Apollo Creed, Clubber Lang, and Ivan Drago being the perfect archnemesis for the heroic Rocky character. Stallone plays the Rocky character with just the right charm. Great timeless classic.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I am so glad I have these DVDs.  Rocky, in my opinion, is one of the most inspiring movies ever made.  Looking at Stallone these days, one might not realize the genius he was when he made Rocky.  I don't think much else needs to be said, because these movies are world famous.  Personally, I think they go downhill as they progress, but I am glad to have these first four Rocky movies.  Rocky 1 and 2 are both truly beautiful movies.  Rocky 3 is good, and Rocky 4 is not bad either.  But man, Rocky 1 is a stroke of genius!  I'd go as far as to say the two movies that changed Hollywood forever are Rocky and Star Wars.  That's how important Rocky is.  Otherwise, the film to DVD transfer quality is just fine - no problem whatsoever.  I'm very glad to own these movies.  Rocky 1 is one of the most inspirational movies ever made.  It is possibly the most inspirational movie ever made.  Some people talk bad about Stallone these days, but I can't go there because of Rocky and Rocky 2.  Well I've rambled enough.  Buy it.

reviewText: All the ROCKY movies in one dvd set, this can't be any less than having a wish granted to you if you're a big fan of SYLVESTER STALLONE. I have adored him and his acting ever since I saw him the very first time on the big screen. He's a gem of a person and a good strong fighter, I mean in real life if you ever have time to read his personal history and struggles. Well, at least he survived.
summary: MY VERY OWN ROCKY COLLECTION, A DREAM COME TRUE.
